name: Kobold Ettin
description: The Kobold Ettin is a medium-sized giant with two heads that constantly bicker, showcasing a mix of giant strength and kobold cunning.
memorable: It is notable for its constant bickering, unique dual persona, and its powerful area control ability called Echoing Burps.
goals: Commonly seeks to engage in combat while utilizing its size and chaotic nature to advantage.
relations: Often encountered with other kobolds or allies in cooperative tactics.
environment: Typically found in underground lairs or areas inhabited by kobolds.
strengths: Strong in melee combat with advantages when supported by allies, also resilient to various conditions.
weaknesses: Significantly hindered by sunlight, which affects its accuracy and perception.
attacks: Can make two attacks using either a Greatclub or a Spear, offering versatility in melee or ranged options.
most_powerful_ability: Echoing Burps can incapacitate foes in a large area while dealing thunder damage.
senses: Possesses darkvision to see in darkness and an average passive perception score of 9.
skills: Has a poor perception skill due to low Wisdom score.
additional_information: Gains advantage on attacks when allies are nearby due to Pack Tactics.
Classifies as a Large Giant for carrying capacity despite being Medium-sized.
Has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, or incapacitated.
Disadvantaged in Stealth checks due to bickering heads.
Its chaotic nature makes it unpredictable in combat.
test_queries: giant creature with two arguing heads
medium giant that uses thunder attacks
strong melee attacker with bickering heads
